product_name: One Way Diamond 600 Exit Cross-Country Poles - Pair
long_description: The Oneway Diamond 600 Alloy Exit ski poles get you setup for casual cross-country skiing without breaking the bank. Aluminum alloy poles offer good performance at a great value. Include EVA grips and adjustable wrist straps. Touring baskets provide effective push off of snow.
short_description: The Oneway Diamond 600 Alloy Exit ski poles get you setup for casual cross-country skiing without breaking the bank.
